ComicInfo.Summary:
END OF STORY ARC
“WAR ON CHRISTMAS,” Part Five
The Queen of the Northland Elves has found a dangerous new weapon and she isn’t afraid to use it! The last Kinmundian, his battlepug, and all their friends must stop her before she conquers our universe (and others)! Don’t miss the stunning conclusion of this story arc that promises to completely change the world of BATTLEPUG as we know it!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|--------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Mike Norton & Allen Passalaqua | 1 | | B | Cover B | Gene Ha | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: War on Christmas Part V
